mean_cn: n. 全神贯注；首先要做的事，急务
mean_en: a state in which you give all your attention to something
sentence: I have a preoccupation with something else that is keeping me from doing my work.
sentence_trans: 我正被一些其他事务打断注意力，这使我无法开展工作。
word_etyma: pre….前的，预先 ＋ occup占有 ＋ ation名词后缀 → 优先占有注意力 → preoccupation全神贯注
